prompt: Given the following HTML: <button id='submit-button'>Submit</button> Provide the appropriate ARIA attributes and description for accessibility.
completion:
ARIA attributes: aria-label='Submit button'
Description: A button used to submit a form.

prompt: Given the following HTML: <input type='text' id='username' placeholder='Enter your username'> What ARIA attributes should be added for accessibility?
completion:
ARIA attributes: aria-labelledby='username-label' aria-describedby='username-description'
Description: An input field for entering a username.

prompt:
Given the following HTML:
Invalid input. Please try again.
Provide the appropriate ARIA attributes and description for accessibility.
completion:
ARIA attributes: aria-live='assertive' aria-relevant='text' aria-atomic='true'
Description: An error message that alerts users to an issue with their input.

prompt: Given the following HTML: <select id='language-selector'><option value='en'>English</option><option value='es'>Espa√±ol</option></select> What ARIA attributes should be added for accessibility?
completion:
ARIA attributes: aria-labelledby='language-selector-label' aria-describedby='language-selector-description'
Description: A dropdown menu for selecting a language.

prompt: Given the following HTML: Provide the appropriate ARIA attributes and description for accessibility.
completion:
ARIA attributes: (empty)
Description: An image displaying a beautiful landscape with descriptive alt text.

prompt:
Given the following HTML:
  • Home

  • Contact
Provide the appropriate ARIA attributes and description for accessibility.
completion:

prompt: Given the following HTML: <label for='email'>Email:</label><input type='email' id='email' name='email' placeholder='Enter your email'> What ARIA attributes should be added for accessibility?
completion:
ARIA attributes: aria-labelledby='email-label' aria-describedby='email-description'
Description: An email input field with a label.

prompt: Given the following HTML: <button id='play-button' onclick='playAudio()'>Play</button> Provide the appropriate ARIA attributes and description for accessibility.
completion:
ARIA attributes: aria-label='Play audio' aria-pressed='false'
Description: A button for playing audio with an accessible label.

prompt:
Given the following HTML:
Provide the appropriate ARIA attributes and description for accessibility.
completion:
ARIA attributes: aria-controls='accordion-content' aria-expanded='false'
Description: An accordion widget for showing/hiding details.

prompt: Given the following HTML: <video controls poster='video-thumbnail.jpg'><source src='video.mp4' type='video/mp4'>Your browser does not support the video tag.</video> Provide the appropriate ARIA attributes and description for accessibility.
completion:
ARIA attributes: aria-label='Video player'
Description: A video player with controls and a poster image.

prompt: Given the following HTML: <input type='text' id='first-name' placeholder='Enter your first name'> What ARIA attributes should be added for accessibility?
completion:
ARIA attributes: aria-labelledby='first-name-label' aria-describedby='first-name-description'
Description: An input field for entering your first name.

completion:

prompt: Given the following HTML: <button id='submit-button'>Submit</button> What ARIA attributes should be added for accessibility?
completion:
